summary:
The SITY, Versity’s exchange token - The SITY token is a fundamental element of the Versity metaverse. It is used for all exchanges and runs on the Polygon blockchain.

 Versity, which allocation structure for SITY? - An allocation in favor of the SITY price evolution

 SITY’s Tokenomics - A team of web3 experts dedicated to Versity

 Burn Versity - A circular economy specific to the Versity ecosystem

 Versity Stress Analysis - An essential strategy for the evolution of SITY
